name: Selbstvergessen
description:
One of the many translations of abandoned to german is "Selbstvergessen". We took the literal sense of the word, which is "self-forgot". The protagonist has forgotten who he is. Depending on how well he handles the hypno-theraphy, it will end in him remembering who he is (or who he thinks he is). 

There are currently 4 different endings.

Controls: Space and ASD

Sonen gamejam, theme: Abandoned

  • Programming and Graphics: Thor Merlin Lervik
  • Music and Voice acting: Stinius Maurstad

2015
